items.summary: Create 30 new high-quality AI prompt records in English across the following backend prompt categories: videoGeneration (video), photoGeneration (photo), cgiAds (ads), and socialMedia (social media). Each prompt must include: title, description, fullText, tags[], and boolean flags isPopular, isNew, isPremium.

Persist the 30 new prompts in the canister so they are returned by getAllPrompts and appear in the prompt library on the frontend. The addition must be idempotent (re-running the addition logic must not create duplicates).
